title: Language Education Design for Building a Sustainable E-Learning Ecosystem

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language learning experience and proficiency in using online learning platforms
context.additional_context: Learner Role: Students/Job Seekers, Domain Expertise: Intermediate, Technology Environment: Digital Devices Provided, Assessment Method: Project-Based Assessment

learning_goals: Learners can analyze and explain the three core components of the e-learning ecosystem framework: instructional methods, content, and system.
Learners can plan and execute language learning projects using a Learning Management System (LMS).
Learners experience a collaborative process of designing and sharing sustainable digital learning resources (learning objects).
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
